snippet.title: BurgerKing Halloween Game Campaign - Gameplay
snippet.description:
BURGER KING® launches three special editions of Entry Level, Red Level and Black Level WHOPPER®® for Halloween and promotes this event by a unique campaign. We created something beyond a campaign: a complete experience through a game. 

The challenge was to create a multi-level Halloween-themed game that combines QR codes, the BURGER KING®  app, discount coupons, a secret event and three different and unique types of BURGER KING® WHOPPER®?
